name: Hunting Parasite
text: Aloof. Hunter. Prey - Bearer only. Spawn - A connecting location (empty if able). Forced - When the enemy phase ends: Place 1 doom on a player card at this enemy's location. Then, discard Hunting Parasite.

name: Obsidian Relic [tdc_rune_y]
text:
If Obsidian Relic [tdc_rune_y] would leave play, remove it from the game.
[action]: Test [intellect] (8). Double the skill icons of each card committed to this skill test. If you succeed, flip this card and resolve its text.

name: Barrier Node
text:
Barrier Node cannot be defeated or leave play.
[reaction] When your turn begins: Heal 1 damage from Barrier Node.
[tdc_rune_q] · [tdc_rune_x] · [tdc_rune_g] · [tdc_rune_k] · [tdc_rune_s]
Barrier Node gets +2 health.

name: Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s]
text: If Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s] would leave play, set it aside, out of play. Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Deal 1 damage to Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s]. [reaction] When you end the game with Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s] under your control: Flip this card and resolve its text.

name: Grisly "Mask"
text:
[fast] Exhaust Grisly "Mask": Disengage from each enemy. Until the beginning of your next turn, you cannot move and cannot damage enemies or engage them.
[tdc_rune_j] · [tdc_rune_m] · [tdc_rune_s] · [tdc_rune_c] · [tdc_rune_b]
[fast] Take 1 direct horror and exhaust Grisly "Mask": Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Parasitic Transformation
text: Revelation - Put Parasitic Transformation into play in your threat area. Forced - After an enemy engages you: Place 1 doom on Parasitic Transformation. [action][action]: Discard Parasitic Transformation.

name: Tidal Tablet
text:
When your location's flood level is increased: Move to a connecting location.
[tdc_rune_l] · [tdc_rune_k] · [tdc_rune_d]
[fast] Exhaust Tidal Tablet: Increase the flood level of your location. Then, choose another flooded location and decrease its flood level.

name: Shard of Y'ch'lecht
text:
You may ignore the first attack made against you by a [[Star Spawn]] or [[Deep One]] enemy each round.
[tdc_rune_b] · [tdc_rune_x] · [tdc_rune_o] · [tdc_rune_k]
[reaction] When a [[Star Spawn]] or [[Deep One]] enemy enters your location, exhaust this card: Exhaust that enemy.

name: Sky Relic [tdc_rune_f]
text:
If Sky Relic [tdc_rune_f] would leave play, remove it from the game.
[action]: Test [agility] (8). Double the skill icons of each card committed to this skill test. If you succeed, flip this card and resolve its text.

name: Obsidian Claw
text: Cannot leave play. Enters play (Speed) side faceup. [fast] During your turn, exhaust this card and choose a location up to 2 connections away: Move to the chosen location. [tdc_rune_a] · [tdc_rune_p] · [tdc_rune_m] · [tdc_rune_e] · [tdc_rune_b] · [tdc_rune_c] [fast]: Flip this card. (Max once per round.)

name: Obsidian Claw
text: Cannot leave play. Enters play (Speed) side faceup. [action] Exhaust Obsidian Claw: Fight. You may use your [agility] instead of your [combat] and get +1 skill value for this attack. If the attacked enemy is exhausted, this attack deals +1 damage. [fast]: Flip this card. (Max once per round.)

name: John Raymond Legrasse
text:
You get +1 skill value while fighting [[Deep One]] and [[Star Spawn]] enemies.
[reaction] During a skill test while fighting or evading Cthulhu, exhaust John Raymond Legrasse: You get +X skill value for this test, where X is Cthulhu's Rage.

name: Horror in Clay
text: Each [[Star Spawn]] enemy loses patrol and its printed Prey instructions and gains hunter and "Prey - You." [tdc_rune_u] · [tdc_rune_x] · [tdc_rune_o] · [tdc_rune_o] · [tdc_rune_d] · [tdc_rune_f] · [tdc_rune_z] [fast] Exhaust Horror in Clay: Either treat this asset's printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round (except for Traits), or move a [[Star Spawn]] enemy once in any direction.

name: No Place Like Home
text: Permanent. Uses (8 discoveries). Forced - When you reveal a location: Remove 1 discovery from No Place Like Home. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 1 [per_investigator] or fewer discoveries on No Place Like Home: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: No Place Like Home
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You may take an additional action during your turn, which may only be used to move.

name: Walk in Faith
text: Permanent. Uses (0 signs). [reaction] After an [elder_sign] token is revealed at any location: Place 1 sign on Walk in Faith. Forced - When the game ends, if there are more than 1 [per_investigator] signs on Walk in Faith: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Walk in Faith
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After an [elder_sign] token is revealed at any location: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at that location.

name: Toe the Line
text: Permanent. Forced - When you take 1 or more damage: Place 1 damage on Toe the Line as well. Forced - When the game ends, if the amount of damage on this card equals or exceeds your maximum health: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Toe the Line
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [combat] and +2 maximum health.

name: Good Money
text: Permanent. [reaction] When you gain 1 or more resources: Place 1 of those resources on Good Money. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 5 or more resources on Good Money: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Good Money
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You begin the game with 5 additional resources.

name: Prove Your Worth
text: Permanent. Uses (4 chances). Forced - After you fail a skill test by 2 or more: Remove 1 chance from Prove Your Worth. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 1 or more chances on Prove Your Worth: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Prove Your Worth
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
Uses (3 chances).
[reaction] When a non-[auto_fail] token is revealed during a skill test at your location, spend 1 chance: Cancel that token.

name: Do No Harm
text: Permanent. Uses (5 obligations). [reaction] After you heal damage/horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset: Remove 1 obligation from Do No Harm. Forced - When the game ends, if there are no obligations on Do No Harm: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Do No Harm
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After you heal damage/horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset, exhaust Do No Harm: Gain 1 resource.

name: Dreams of Destruction
text: Permanent. Forced - When you take 1 or more horror: Place 1 horror on Dreams of Destruction as well. Forced - When the game ends, if the amount of horror on this card equals or exceeds your maximum sanity: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Dreams of Destruction
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You have 1 additional arcane slot and get +2 maximum sanity.

name: Plumb the Depths
text: Permanent. Uses (5 obsessions). Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue at your location: Remove 1 obsession from Plumb the Depths. Forced - When the game ends, if there are no obsessions on Plumb the Depths: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Plumb the Depths
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discover the last clue at your location, exhaust Plumb the Depths: Draw 1 card.

name: Expedition Gear
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage from an investigator at your location.
[fast] Remove Expedition Gear from the game: Move a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location once in any direction.

name: Laudanum
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location.
[reaction] When you draw a non-weakness [[Power]] or [[Terror]] treachery, remove Laudanum from the game: Cancel that treachery's revelation effect and discard it.

name: Alien Tablet
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Glyph]] or [[R'lyeh]] card, exhaust Alien Tablet and spend 1 secret: The performing investigator gets +2 skill value for this skill test.

name: Diving Suit
text: If your location is fully flooded, you may treat it as if it were partially flooded for the purposes of card effects. Forced - When any amount of damage would be placed on you: Place 1 of that damage on Diving Suit.

flavor: "Life's just one big score, and I plan to be the winner."
name: Ruby Standish
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[fast] If there are no ready enemies at your location, exhaust Ruby Standish: Move to a connecting location.

flavor: "I thought this story was gonna go in a very different direction."
name: Andy Van Nortwick
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
If your location has no clues on it, ignore the first attack of opportunity made against you each round.
